reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports by 31 July 2010, 15 October 2010, and 15 December 2010
summary:
Encourages MINURCAT and the UN country team to prevent armed groups' recruitment of refugees and children.

Takes note of Chad's measures to prevent child recruitment, encourages further cooperation with UN bodies.

Requests the Secretary-General to provide regular reports on the security and humanitarian situation, progress in implementing agreements, and MINURCAT's mandate.

Requests assessments on international and regional options for the Central African Republic and lessons learned in the context of MINURCAT.

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
